original_text: As for me, it is nearly time for me to die. My death will be like a drink offering that they pour out to God. My life as God's servant will end.
korean_text: 전제와 같이 내가 벌써 부어지고 나의 떠날 시각이 가까웠도다

sentences.original_text: As for me, it is nearly time for me to die.
My death will be like a drink offering
that they pour out to God.
My life as God's servant will end.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 종으로서의 나의 삶은 끝이 날 것입니다.
